title: Getting Rid of Unhealthy Assumptions
itunes:summary:
False assumptions about your spouse are toxic. If left undealt with, they can lead to mistrust. Erin and John offer hope to couples struggling with resentment and false assumptions. Featuring Pastor Levi Lusko, Jennie Lusko, and Jean Daly.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Crazy Little Thing Called Marriage" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-07-06?refcd=1111507

Get more resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/getting-rid-of-unhealthy-assumptions/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
